Talk03_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>You what? You went INSIDE the hole?
Did you find the demon?!

Is...<sp:5:1:0> Is this goodbye for me?


<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>Wait. A demon...<sp:5:1:0>STATUE was in there,
you say?<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I know a bit about those.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Want to know what I know?
Talk03_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>It's Robbie's spending allowance
for next month, but now it's your
spending allowance.
Thanks for clearing this whole thing up
for me.

Right. Time to settle the ol' nerves and
get back to work!
Talk03_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal_00>So the voice I heard was the forlorn
horned statue...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>As there is the Goddess of light, then it
follows that she would have an opposite—
the horned god.
Like light and dark, one cannot exist
without the other—their power manifests
through the other's existence.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Knocking a hole in the wall? That was
fate, no doubt about it.

I can't go in there, but I'll keep this area
spick-and-span.

And I'll be sure to greet the horned statue
from here too.

Oh, and thanks, you know? Take this.
Talk03_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Chat_00>"A dealer in life and power, touched by
the wrath of the Goddess, fallen to ruin."

Then that must mean the horned statue
is an entity who deals in life and power!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Which would make the dais the place
where it was enshrined, back when
it was still a god.
Talk02_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think>I mean, it's always so dusty around here,
and I was working extra hard to clear it
all out.
You'd think a measly broom banging into
a wall wouldn't be enough to collapse it,
but here we are...
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>Ever since, I sometimes hear a <clr:0000>creepy
voice <clr:ffff>coming from this hole. Ugh, it's
probably something awful, like a demon...
And that demon is definitely angry
with me.

<sp:0:2:2:5000>Robbie, Granté... Goodbye forever...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk01_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Chat_01>Hey, look who it is! I'd recognize that
face anywhere.

And any face I know is the face of
a friend!

Please, Link. Help yourself to anything in
this shelter. It's all yours to <clr:0000>use as you
see fit<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But you should probably avoid this area
in particular...

Sometimes I hear a <clr:0000>creepy voice <clr:ffff>coming
from this hole—it almost sounds like
a <clr:0000>demon <clr:ffff>growling or something.
No one else claims to hear it, but I
certainly do.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Between you and me, I kind of worry
I awakened some demon when I busted
up this wall.
And my even bigger worry is that the
demon has it out for me now...

<sp:0:2:2:5000>Robbie, Granté... My beloved family...
Goodbye forever...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk01_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>Oh hey, it's you again. So you know, I've
taken the time to say all my goodbyes.

The thing is, it's always really dusty
around here, so I work overtime to clean
it all up.
Well, I was working SO hard, in fact, that
the force of my broom accidentally took
out part of this wall.
Ever since, I've been hearing this <clr:0000>creepy
voice <clr:ffff>coming from the hole I made—it
almost sounds like a <clr:0000>demon <clr:ffff>growling...
No one else claims to hear it, but I
certainly do.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>At this point, I'm pretty sure I unsettled
that demon when I busted up the wall...

So it stands to reason that if it wants
revenge, I'll be the one who's targeted!

<sp:0:2:2:5000>Robbie, Granté... Goodbye forever...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk03_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>I broke the wall and angered the demon.
And I'll be paying for it with my life.

<sp:0:2:2:5000>Robbie, Granté... Goodbye forever...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
